testCaseName: Verify that multiple tasks marked as completed can be recovered at once.
name: Verify that multiple tasks marked as completed can be recovered at once.
description: This test case is to verify that two or more tasks marked as completed on a quick succession can be recovered by using the [Undo] button that pops up after marking them as completed.

parameters.name: action
parameters.value: Click on [Log in] button on Main page
